89902.text: For GCE cluster provider, fix bug of not being able to create internal type load balancer for clusters with more than 1000 nodes in a single zone.
89902.markdown: For GCE cluster provider, fix bug of not being able to create internal type load balancer for clusters with more than 1000 nodes in a single zone. ([#89902](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89902), [@wojtek-t](https://github.com/wojtek-t)) [SIG Cloud Provider, Network and Scalability]
89902.author: wojtek-t

89908.text: Fix scheduler crash when removing node before its pods
89908.markdown: Fix scheduler crash when removing node before its pods ([#89908](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89908), [@alculquicondor](https://github.com/alculquicondor)) [SIG Scheduling]
89908.author: alculquicondor

89965.text: Fixes conversion error for HorizontalPodAutoscaler objects with invalid annotations
89965.markdown: Fixes conversion error for HorizontalPodAutoscaler objects with invalid annotations ([#89965](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89965), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG Autoscaling]
89965.author: liggitt

89970.text: Restores priority of static control plane pods in the cluster/gce/manifests control-plane manifests
89970.markdown: Restores priority of static control plane pods in the cluster/gce/manifests control-plane manifests ([#89970](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89970), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG Cluster Lifecycle and Node]
89970.author: liggitt

89975.text: client-go: resolves an issue with informers falling back to full list requests when timeouts are encountered, rather than re-establishing a watch.
89975.markdown: Client-go: resolves an issue with informers falling back to full list requests when timeouts are encountered, rather than re-establishing a watch. ([#89975](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89975), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery and Testing]
89975.author: liggitt

90016.text: Fixes kubectl apply/prune in namespace other than default.
90016.markdown: Fixes kubectl apply/prune in namespace other than default. ([#90016](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90016), [@seans3](https://github.com/seans3)) [SIG CLI and Testing]
90016.author: seans3

90019.text: Fixes a bug defining a default value for a replicas field in a custom resource definition that has the scale subresource enabled
90019.markdown: Fixes a bug defining a default value for a replicas field in a custom resource definition that has the scale subresource enabled ([#90019](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90019), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery, CLI, Cloud Provider, Cluster Lifecycle and Instrumentation]
90019.author: liggitt
